mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.bmname,c.ryxm,d.ryxm as spname FROM wflizhi a , wfdepartment b ,wfstafftable c,wfstafftable d where 1=1 and a.ryid = c.ryid and a.bmid =b.bmid and a.spid=d.ryid and (a.spzt=4 or a.spzt=6)

SELECT a.*,b.bmname,c.ryxm,d.ryxm as spname FROM wflizhi a , wfdepartment b ,wfstafftable c,wfstafftable d where 1=1 and a.ryid = c.ryid and a.bmid =b.bmid and a.spid=d.ryid and (a.spzt=3 or a.spzt=5)
